title: Five hour beef and mushroom casserole
ingredients: ['1kg diced beef stewing steak', '4 carrots, chopped', '2 onions, sliced into rings', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '125ml Burgundy wine', '3 tablespoons plain flour', '2 (400g) tins diced tomatoes', '225g passata', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '350g potatoes, diced', '500g mushrooms, quartered']
